00014 /*
00015  * @brief LHTElem is a wrapper class for DataType and provide next elem
00016  * for List like behaviour within the LinearHashTable.
00017  */
00018 template <typename DataType> class LHTElem {
00019         template <typename D> friend class Segment;
00020 
00021         template <typename KeyType, typename D, typename LockType> friend class LinearHashTable;
00022 
00023 private:
00024         DataType data;
00025         LHTElem<DataType>* next;
00026         LHTElem(const LHTElem& source) :
00027                 data(source.data), next(source.next) {
00028         }
00029         LHTElem(const DataType& d) :
00030                 data(d), next(NULL) {
00031         }
00032         LHTElem& operator=(const LHTElem& source) {
00033                 if (this != &source) {
00034                         data= source.data;
00035                         next = source.next;
00036                 }
00037                 return *this;
00038         }
00039         ~LHTElem() {
00040         } // next items are deleted in the Segment typename.
00041 };
00042 
00043 /*
00044  * @brief Segment is used to support dynamic growth/shrink property of
00045  * LinearHashTable typename.
00046  */
00047 template <typename DataType> class Segment {
00048         template <typename KeyType, typename D, typename LockType> friend class LinearHashTable;
00049 
00050 private:
00051         LHTElem<DataType> *seg[IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE];
00052 
00053         Segment() {
00054                 for (int i = 0; i < IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE; i++)
00055                         seg[i] = NULL;
00056         }
00057 
00058         ~Segment() {
00059                 for (int i = 0; i < IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE; i++) {
00060                         if (seg[i]) {
00061                                 LHTElem<DataType> *curr = seg[i];
00062                                 do {
00063                                         // delete all the LHTElem objects following its next link.
00064                                         LHTElem<DataType> *next = curr->next;
00065                                         delete curr;
00066                                         curr = next;
00067                                 } while (curr);
00068                         }
00069                 }
00070         }
00071 };

00089 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType=NullLock > class LinearHashTable :
00090          public AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType, LockType> {
00091         typedef DataType<KeyType, ValueType> DataType;
00092 
00093         int p; // next bucket to be split
00094         int maxp; // upper bound on p during this expansion
00095         int keycount; // number of records in the table
00096         int currentsize; // current number of buckets
00097         double minloadfctr, maxloadfctr; // lower and upper bound on the load factor
00098         Segment<DataType>* directory[IZENE_DIRECTORY_SIZE];
00099         LockType lock; // for thread-safe
00100 
00101 protected:
00102         int hash(const KeyType& key) const;
00103         void expand_table();
00104         void contract_table(); //  { /* @@ yet to be implemented */ }
00105         void init();
00106 
00107 public:
00108         LinearHashTable();
00109         LinearHashTable(double minloadf, double maxloadf);
00110 
00111         ~LinearHashTable();
00112         void release();
00113 
00114         int num_items() const {
00115                 return ((LinearHashTable*)this)->get_current_items();
00116         }
00117         int get_current_items() {
00118                 lock.acquire_read_lock();
00119                 int currentItems = keycount;
00120                 lock.release_read_lock();
00121                 return currentItems;
00122         }
00123         int num_buckets() const {
00124                 return currentsize;
00125         }
00126 
00127         ValueType* find(const KeyType& key);
00128         inline const ValueType* find(const KeyType& key) const {
00129                 return (const ValueType*)((LinearHashTable *)this)->find(key);
00130         }
00131 
00132         bool insert(const DataType& elem); // standard insert.
00133         bool insert(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& value) {
00134                 return insert(DataType(key, value) );
00135         }

00142         //}

00155         template<typename Archive> void save(Archive & ar,
00156                         const unsigned int version = 0) const {
00157                 ar & keycount;
00158                 int d = 0;
00159                 for (int i=0; i<IZENE_DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++) {
00160                         for (int j =0; j<IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE; j++) {
00161                                 if (!directory[i])
00162                                         continue;
00163                                 if (!directory[i]->seg[j])
00164                                         continue;
00165                                 LHTElem<DataType>* elem = directory[i]->seg[j]; // first on chain
00166                                 while (elem != NULL) {
00167                                         ++d;
00168                                         ar & elem->data;
00169                                         elem = elem->next;
00170                                 }
00171                         }
00172                 }
00173         }
00174 
00175         template<typename Archive> void load(Archive & ar,
00176                         const unsigned int version = 0) {
00177                 int n;
00178                 ar & n;
00179 
00180                 for (int i =0; i<n; i++) {
00181                         DataType dat;
00182                         ar & dat;
00183                         insert(dat);
00184                 }
00185         }
00186 
00187         void copyTo(AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType, LockType>& am) const {
00188 
00189                 int d = 0;
00190                 for (int i=0; i<IZENE_DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++) {
00191                         for (int j =0; j<IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE; j++) {
00192                                 if (!directory[i])
00193                                         continue;
00194                                 if (!directory[i]->seg[j])
00195                                         continue;
00196                                 LHTElem<DataType>* elem = directory[i]->seg[j]; // first on chain
00197                                 while (elem != NULL) {
00198                                         ++d;
00199                                         am.insert(elem->data);
00200                                         elem = elem->next;
00201                                 }
00202                         }
00203                 }
00204 
00205         }
00206 
00207 };

00224 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType> void LinearHashTable<
00225                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType>::init() {
00226         p = 0;
00227         maxp = IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE;
00228         keycount = 0;
00229         currentsize = IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE;
00230         minloadfctr = IZENE_MIN_LOAD_FACTOR;
00231         maxloadfctr = IZENE_MAX_LOAD_FACTOR;
00232         directory[0] = new Segment<DataType>();
00233 
00234         for (int i = 1; i < IZENE_DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++)
00235                 directory[i] = NULL;
00236 }

00241 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType> void LinearHashTable<
00242                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType>::release() {
00243         for (int i = 0; i < IZENE_DIRECTORY_SIZE; i++) {
00244                 delete directory[i];
00245                 directory[i] = NULL;
00246         }
00247         init();
00248 }

00276 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType> int LinearHashTable<
00277                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType>::hash(const KeyType& key) const {
00278         int h, address;
00279 
00280         h = izenelib::util::sdb_hashing<KeyType>(key) % HashFunction<KeyType>::PRIME;
00281         address = h % maxp;
00282         if (address < p)
00283                 address = h % (2*maxp);
00284 
00285         return address;
00286 }

00291 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType> void LinearHashTable<
00292                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType>::expand_table() {
00293         int newaddress, oldsegmentindex, newsegmentindex;
00294         Segment<DataType>* oldsegment, *newsegment;
00295         LHTElem<DataType>* current, *previous; // for scanning down the old chain
00296         LHTElem<DataType>* lastofnew; // points to the last DataType of the new chain
00297 
00298         // reached maximum size of address space? if so, just continue the chaining.
00299         if (maxp + p < IZENE_DIRECTORY_SIZE * IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE) {
00300                 // locate the bucket to be split
00301                 oldsegment = directory[p/IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE];
00302                 oldsegmentindex = p % IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE;
00303 
00304                 // Expand address space, if necessary create a new Segment<DataType>
00305                 newaddress = maxp + p;
00306                 newsegmentindex = newaddress % IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE;
00307                 if (newsegmentindex == 0)
00308                         directory[newaddress / IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE] = new Segment<DataType>();
00309                 newsegment = directory[newaddress / IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE];
00310 
00311                 // adjust the state variables
00312                 p = p + 1;
00313                 if (p == maxp) {
00314                         maxp = 2 * maxp;
00315                         p = 0;
00316                 }
00317 
00318                 currentsize = currentsize + 1;
00319 
00320                 // relocate records to the new bucket
00321                 current = oldsegment->seg[oldsegmentindex];
00322                 previous = NULL;
00323                 lastofnew = NULL;
00324                 newsegment->seg[newsegmentindex] = NULL;
00325 
00326                 while (current != NULL) {
00327                         if (hash(current->data.get_key()) == newaddress) {
00328                                 // attach it to the end of the new chain
00329                                 if (lastofnew == NULL)
00330                                         newsegment->seg[newsegmentindex] = current;
00331                                 else
00332                                         lastofnew->next = current;
00333                                 if (previous == NULL)
00334                                         oldsegment->seg[oldsegmentindex] = current->next;
00335                                 else
00336                                         previous->next = current->next;
00337                                 lastofnew = current;
00338                                 current = current->next;
00339                                 lastofnew->next = NULL;
00340                         } else {
00341                                 // leave it on the old chain
00342                                 previous = current;
00343                                 current = current->next;
00344                         }
00345                 }
00346         }
00347 }
00348 
00352 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType> void LinearHashTable<
00353                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType>::contract_table() {
00354         int oldsegmentindex, newsegmentindex;
00355         Segment<DataType> *oldsegment, *newsegment;
00356         LHTElem<DataType> *current, *previous; // for scanning down the new/current chain
00357 
00358         // Is the table contractable or has more than one segment
00359         if (currentsize > IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE) { // there is a bucket to shrink.
00360                 // locate the bucket to free
00361                 currentsize--;
00362 
00363                 oldsegment = directory[currentsize/IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE];
00364                 oldsegmentindex = currentsize % IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE;
00365 
00366                 // adjust the state variables
00367                 p = p - 1;
00368                 if (p < 0) {
00369                         maxp = maxp/2;
00370                         p = maxp - 1;
00371                 }
00372 
00373                 newsegment = directory[p/IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE];
00374                 newsegmentindex = p % IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE;
00375 
00376                 // relocate records to the new bucket
00377                 current = newsegment->seg[newsegmentindex];
00378 
00379                 // sacn down the end of the current where the additonal records
00380                 // will be attached to.
00381                 previous = current;
00382                 while (current != NULL) {
00383                         previous = current;
00384                         current = current->next;
00385                 }
00386                 // attach the chain of records to the end of the new bucket
00387                 if (previous) {
00388                         previous->next = oldsegment->seg[oldsegmentindex];
00389                 } else
00390                         newsegment->seg[newsegmentindex] = oldsegment->seg[oldsegmentindex];
00391 
00392                 oldsegment->seg[oldsegmentindex] = NULL;
00393 
00394                 // if necessary delete the old Segment<DataType>
00395                 if (oldsegmentindex == 0) {
00396                         delete directory[currentsize/IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE];
00397                         directory[currentsize/IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE] = NULL;
00398                 }
00399         }
00400 }
00401 
00402 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType> ValueType* LinearHashTable<
00403                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType>::find(const KeyType& key) {
00404         // first requests the read lock
00405         lock.acquire_read_lock();
00406         int address = hash(key);
00407         LHTElem<DataType>* elem =
00408                         directory[address/IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE]->seg[address % IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE]; // first on chain
00409         while (elem != NULL) {
00410                 if (key == elem->data.get_key()) {// found!
00411                         // release the read lock
00412                         lock.release_read_lock();
00413                         return (ValueType*) &elem->data.get_value();
00414                 } else
00415                         elem = elem->next;
00416         }
00417         // release the read lock
00418         lock.release_read_lock();
00419         // not found
00420         return NULL;
00421 }

00426 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType> bool LinearHashTable<
00427                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType>::insert(const DataType& elem) {
00428         // first requests the write lock
00429         lock.acquire_write_lock();
00430         if (maxloadfctr * currentsize <= keycount)
00431                 expand_table(); // due for expanding table
00432 
00433         const KeyType& key = elem.get_key();
00434         int address = hash(key);
00435         Segment<DataType>* currentSegment = directory[address/IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE];
00436         int segIndex = address % IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE;
00437         LHTElem<DataType>* e = currentSegment->seg[segIndex]; // first on chain
00438         if (e == NULL)
00439                 currentSegment->seg[segIndex] = new LHTElem<DataType>(elem);
00440         else {
00441                 while (e->next != NULL) {
00442                         if (e->data.get_key() == key) {// duplicate data
00443                                 // release the write lock
00444                                 lock.release_write_lock();
00445                                 return false;
00446                         }
00447                         e = e->next; // go to the end of the chain
00448                 }
00449                 if (e->data.get_key() == key) {
00450                         // release the write lock
00451                         lock.release_write_lock();
00452                         return false;
00453                 }
00454                 e->next = new LHTElem<DataType>(elem);
00455         }
00456 
00457         keycount++; // increment key count by one.
00458         // release the write lock
00459         lock.release_write_lock();
00460         return true;
00461 }

00470 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType> bool LinearHashTable<
00471                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType>::del(const KeyType& key) {
00472         // first requests the write lock
00473         lock.acquire_write_lock();
00474         if (minloadfctr * currentsize > keycount)
00475                 contract_table();
00476 
00477         int address = hash(key);
00478         LHTElem<DataType>* elem =
00479                         directory[address/IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE]->seg[address % IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE]; // first on chain
00480         LHTElem<DataType>* prev = elem;
00481 
00482         while (elem != NULL) {
00483                 if (key == elem->data.get_key()) { // found!
00484                         if (prev == elem) //
00485                                 directory[address/IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE]->seg[address % IZENE_SEGMENT_SIZE]
00486                                                 = prev->next;
00487                         else
00488                                 prev->next = elem->next;
00489 
00490                         delete elem;
00491                         keycount--;
00492                         // release the write lock
00493                         lock.release_write_lock();
00494                         return true;
00495                 } else {
00496                         prev = elem;
00497                         elem = elem->next;
00498                 }
00499         }
00500         // release the write lock
00501         lock.release_write_lock();
00502         // not found
00503         return false;
00504 }

00510 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType> void LinearHashTable<
00511                 KeyType, ValueType, LockType>::display(std::ostream& stream) const {
00512         stream << "Member variables: " << std::endl;
00513         stream << "the number of buckets: " << currentsize << std::endl;
00514         stream << "the number of records: " << keycount << std::endl;
00515         stream << "max load factor: " << maxloadfctr << std::endl;
00516         stream << "min load factor: " << minloadfctr << std::endl;
00517         stream << "max p value: " << maxp << std::endl;
00518         stream << "current p value: " << p << std::endl;
00519 }
